name: Zup! 2
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 15 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space

reviews.review_text: +great sequel of zup and is a bit harder to get all achievements
honestly i just need this achievement's game for my profile ... btw this is a nice game

For $1 and 30 minutes of your time, you'll be granted over 200 achievements!  From the creator(s) of  Zup!  comes  Zup! 2  with even more achievements to rain upon your pretty little head.  The main difference compared to its predecessor is that this time, you'll be doing 2D physics-based puzzles with a ball instead of a cube, which adds a rolling mechanic where you would have expected to stop. Not saying it's better or inferior, but it just feels right. The game even has some free DLC to enjoy for an additional 5 minutes.  Can't really say much bad about this game aside from it simply being short. It's really a nice experience with a bit of replayability should you enjoy this particular kind of title.  Is it worth the asking price of $1? I'd still recommend getting  Zup! 2  for a sale at about 50-80 cents, but seeing as you get card drops you can sell, I can't complain too much.  8/10 It's raining achievements! HALLELUJAH!!

66 levels and 229 achievements! What more could you want for 67 pence? Oh and it's quite a good puzzle game as well. Zup with the DLC took 35 minutes to complete, Zup2 took 40 minutes so it must be a little harder :D
Playthrough time: 30 minutes Metagame: Achievement-Frenzy  Without metagame: very boring With metagame: ok for 1$
Simple, fun, and well designed achivements. Good deal. 10/10
Achievement wh*re dream!   229 eazy achievemets!   Zup 3 Cumfirmed!   Zup 3 = More ach's and 5-10min's more gameplay! XD  VERY ACHIEVEMENTS. MUCH GAMEPLAY. SO CHEAP.
This game wins the award for the most expletives I've used in one hour of gameplay in 2016.

Very similar to the first game, Zup 2 builds on the premise of physics-based puzzles and gameplay. Short and entertaining, it is worth a buy, but do not expect deep and engaging gameplay - this resembles more of a tech demo.  Recommended for achievement hunters - quick to complete.  Played on Windows 10 Pro x64 without any problems.
Very good and nice looking game!! Everyone should play this game i recommend it!
Just like you all I bought it for the achievements.  Great game! Fun and very quick but also cheap! Cant wait for the 3rd if there is one  7/10
and i already waiting ZUP! 3 with 1000000000 achievements !  keep the amazing work dear zup!
I love it!

Very Simplistic Game that still offers Enjoyment and plus its a .99 cent game or .84 cents until December 12. It's a Very good game for its price and it offers 200+ achievements for customating your profile.
229 achievements in less than 30 minutes.  The only complaint I have that I didn't unlock any achievement by writing this review.
Free achievements simulator easy & short game
28 minutes later...  Completed the game with all achievements. Can't wait for Zup! 3. 10/10 would recommend.

The best 67p i have spent in a long time, puzzles are figured out within 2 or 3 shots on hard ones but its still just a nice little game to chill with.  67p people come on i have played some supposedly top games at 20 30 quid and played them less than this  Lovley little game to add to you collection, CRAZY Achievments just hitting you fast
Loved the first one, love this one as well!  But one thing is wrong, it should've gotten 236 achievements :P
What an awesome 30 minutes, feels a bit smarter by now.
229 achievements in 30-40 minutes, yes please.

Zup and Zup 2 are two wonderful games if you are looking for easy achievements! They are both cheap games and will provide about 30 minutes of gameplay total.   And for a bonus i got a foil card from Zup card that i sold for 1€

It's the first game with circles.  You try to get it onto a green patch via exploding blocks and hitting things. The concept is simple and the levels are fun enough. The main challanges are clicking on the right blocks and timing. Some of the levels feel cheap because of the first reason as the way to solve the level is to click on the right one of the 4 blocks. There was potential to make the levels more challenging because the ball keeps its momentum so it can roll off but only a few levels take actual advantage of that fact. You'll beat the game in 20 minutes so it's probably worth a dollar but I feel like the concept could have gone a lot further.   There are a ♥♥♥♥ ton of achievements for not really a good reason and it seems super gimmicky and stupid really.  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Easiest 229 achievements earnt in my life!
Great little game if you want easy 100% achievements, took me about a half hour and I got 229.  Can't wait for Zup 3.
Easy game for relax. Good variant for rest. All achivments can get without big stress!
10/10 Finished game in 35 minutes
Nice game
Terrorist testing game.   10/10 would blow up again
Even harder than the last one!!!1!1 32 minutes to complete the whole game! Ain't nobody got time for that!  Waiting for Zup! 3!
Best achievement swarm for low cost. Get it if you are an achiavement fanatic like me
Actually bought this for the achievements, but it was a decently fun game none the less.
Beat it and all achievements in 15 minutes.

We must remain grateful that games like theese are not illegal on steam, games that give you so many achievements with so little effort. More enjoyable than the first Zup but lets face it, you didn't buy this game for the 'gameplay' but only for the achievements - all 229 of them.

Easy achievement spammer that includes trading cards. Not really a game. If you plan on buying one, just buy the bundle. Don't buy the bundle or the individual games without a sale, it's really not worth more than $0.80 for one or $1.40 for both.
It's awful!
